uber-uns.title: About us
uber-uns.subtitle: Over 25 years of experience in professional building cleaning.

hero.alt: About us – O&I CLEAN group GmbH

sections.heading: Hotel Cleaning
sections.body: Our company, Ö&I CLEAN group GmbH, has been in business for over 25 years and is one of the leading building cleaning companies. In recent years, we have expanded and now operate nationwide across Germany. Our main focus is hotel cleaning. Our clientele includes numerous large hotel chains as well as private and commercial companies.

sections.heading: Employees & Values
sections.body: We employ over 2000 flexible staff members who have proven their reliability over the years. As our customer, you will feel that we place great value on sustainable practices and keep our promises – that is what sets us apart from other companies.

sections.heading: Trust & Passion
sections.body: Trust and respect towards our employees and, of course, our customers, form the fundamental basis of our company. We are a service provider with a well-coordinated team and a passion for what we do. That is our top priority.

qualitatsmanagement.title: Quality Management
qualitatsmanagement.subtitle: For us, quality is not just a word – it is a commitment.

hero.alt: Quality Management – O&I CLEAN group GmbH

sections.heading: Quality
sections.body: A quality check ensures that the desired requirements and wishes of the customer are actually met. The quality of the product or service is individual for each customer – it depends on the respective customer or company. We at Ö&I CLEAN group GmbH stand by our name: Quality is our top priority.

mitarbeiter-schulungen.subtitle: Regular training and development programs for social and technical competencies.

hero.alt: Employee Training – O&I CLEAN group GmbH

sections.heading: Overview
sections.body: Employee training should take place regularly within a company. Employees are supported in both social and technical areas – whether fundamentally or in the form of refresher training. Training can be conducted individually or in groups.

haufig-gestellte-fragen-faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
haufig-gestellte-fragen-faq.subtitle: Answers to the most frequently asked questions about our cleaning services.

sections.heading: Why is deep cleaning important?
sections.body: Deep (general) cleaning is important at regular intervals because dust and dirt can accumulate in even the smallest corners of a room or building that are not reached by routine cleaning.

sections.heading: What is maintenance cleaning?
sections.body: Maintenance cleaning covers the regular cleaning of all common and public areas.

sections.heading: How often should cleaning be done?
sections.body: Routine cleaning should ideally take place daily. Deep cleaning should be performed at regular intervals.

sections.heading: Why should I hire a professional company?
sections.body: A professional company possesses specialized cleaning methods, professional cleaning agents, and, naturally, the necessary experience.

hero.alt: Privacy Notice – O&I CLEAN group GmbH

sections.heading: Privacy Principles
sections.body: The operators of these pages take the protection of your personal data very seriously. We treat your personal data confidentially and in accordance with the statutory data protection regulations and this privacy notice.

sections.heading: Data Collection & Use
sections.body: The use of our website is generally possible without providing personal data. Insofar as personal data (e.g., name, address, or email addresses) are collected on our pages, this is always done on a voluntary basis whenever possible. These data will not be passed on to third parties without your explicit consent.

sections.heading: Security of Data Transmission
sections.body: We point out that data transmission over the Internet (e.g., when communicating by email) may have security vulnerabilities. Complete protection of data against access by third parties is not possible.
